mapper.select: SELECT snippet_id, user_id, folder_id, color_id, source_url, type, memo, created_at, updated_at, like_count, visibility FROM snippets WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND visibility = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT snippet_id, user_id, folder_id, color_id, source_url, type, memo, created_at, updated_at, like_count, visibility FROM snippets WHERE visibility = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC

LIMIT #{limit}
